sentences.en: "Fourteen minutes," Chris said, taking a peep at his watch.
sentences.cn: “14分钟,”克里斯瞥了一眼他的手表说道.

sentences.en: By the 1930s the wristwatch had almost completely supplanted the pocket watch.
sentences.cn: 到了20世纪30年代，手表几乎完全取代了怀表。

sentences.en: Do you mind if I watch?
sentences.cn: 你介意我看着吗？

sentences.en: Environmentalists will be on the watch for damage to wildlife.
sentences.cn: 环境保护主义者将会密切关注对野生动物造成的伤害。

sentences.en: had to watch it when I stepped onto the ice.
sentences.cn: 当我走上冰面就不得不留神了

sentences.en: How do you keep track of time if you don’t wear a watch?
sentences.cn: 如果你不戴表，怎么知道时间？

sentences.en: I wound up the watch and listened to it tick.
sentences.cn: 我给表上紧发条，听着它嘀嗒作响。

sentences.en: In prison they'd taken away his watch and everything he possessed.
sentences.cn: 在监狱，他们把他的手表和其他一切东西都搜走了。

sentences.en: Jose, as usual, had climbed a tree to keep watch.
sentences.cn: 乔斯像往常一样爬到树上放哨。

sentences.en: Most parents don’t know what their kids are watching on TV.
sentences.cn: 大多数父母不知道自己的孩子都在看什么电视节目。

sentences.en: My watch has stopped.
sentences.cn: 我的表停了。

sentences.en: Outside, Bruce glanced at his watch: "Dear me, nearly oneo'clock."
sentences.cn: 出了门，布鲁斯瞥了一眼自己的手表，“天哪，快一点了。”

sentences.en: Parents can't be expected to watch their children 24 hours a day.
sentences.cn: 父母不可能每天24小时照看孩子。

sentences.en: Ruth could not bear to watch her parents arguing.
sentences.cn: 露丝看不得父母争吵。

sentences.en: The two men turned to watch the horses going round the track.
sentences.cn: 那两个男人转身观看赛马沿赛道而行。

sentences.en: Then we'd go home and cuddle up together to watch TV.
sentences.cn: 然后我们就回家，依偎在一起看电视。

sentences.en: Watch out for bargains, but never buy dented cans.
sentences.cn: 留意便宜货，但绝不要买表面凹陷的罐头。

sentences.en: Watch them carefully as they finish cooking because they can burn easily.
sentences.cn: 就要做好时得小心看着，因为它们很容易烧糊。

sentences.en: Watch this space for details of our next event.
sentences.cn: 请继续关注我们对下一事件的详细报道。

sentences.en: We can't just sit by and watch you throw your life away.
sentences.cn: 我们不能眼睁睁地看着你毁掉自己的生活。

sentences.en: We sat and watched the sunset.
sentences.cn: 我们坐下来看日落。

sentences.en: You'll lose your girlish figure if you don't watch out.
sentences.cn: 如果不多加注意，你就会失去女孩般的苗条身段。

words.tran_cn: 观察者；看守人；哨兵；（美）选举监票员

phrases.tran_cn: 保护自己（或他人）（以防意外的危险）
注意寻找；戒备；小心提防

trans.tran_cn: 表，注意，注视，观察，值班（人）
trans.tran_en: a small clock that you wear on your wrist or keep in your pocket
to look at someone or something for a period of time, paying attention to what is happening

trans.tran_cn: 看，注视，观察，照看，监视，当心，留意，对…保持关注
trans.tran_en: to look at someone or something for a period of time, paying attention to what is happening
